newsitem.title: FRANCE: SOCCER-LE HAVRE SIGN ENGLISH STRIKER ON LOAN.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-LE HAVRE SIGN ENGLISH STRIKER ON LOAN.

text.p: French first division club Le Havre have signed English striker Chris Kiwomya from Arsenal on loan for six months with an option for a full transfer.
Kiwomya, 27, played 210 league matches and scored 51 goals for Ipswich Town before his transfer to Arsenal last year. He made only 14 league appearances for the London club.
